text: Kache Aye Shoi (English: Come close, my friend) was a Bengali television serial which used to air on Zee Bangla. It starred Chandini Saha and Gourob Roy Chaudhary in lead roles. == Cast == * Chandni Saha as Shoi * Mimi Dutta as Brishti * Priyam as Ujaan Roy Chowdhury * Gourab Roy Chowdhury as Roop * Bhaswar Chatterjee as Tiyash * Rupsha Chakraborty as Raahi * Shaon Dey as Shampa * Pushpita Mukherjee as Mithu * Shanghamitra Talukdar as Rinku == References == Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2013 television series debuts Category:2013 establishments in India Category:2014 Indian television series endings
title: Kache Aye Shoi
